title: Club bug
body: I have the bug where i can not see my club .

replies.body: Are you the owner of the club?  There was a [recent issue](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016) with clubs that has since been resolved.  Let me know the name and tag of your club, and I'd be happy to take a look!

tag sεxy  
can u fix it ?

Yes i'm the owner .
club name :  Rito Buff Annie Plz 
club tag : Annie 
ty XD
